basics.name: Dinesh Weerapurage
basics.label: Lead Software Engineer
basics.summary: I was born and raised in Sri Lanka. I earned my computer science degrees from University of Moratuwa and University of Tennessee. I worked in two startups, a government lab and a consulting company. I am passionate about backend development and cloud deployments. I enjoy reading, meditating and running.

work.summary: As a lead software engineer at KPMG, I have engaged in variety of projects advancing breadth and depth of my knowledge on technologies
highlights: I developed a backend, daily porting framework, to serve telecom daily porting data to some of the biggest mobile carriers. I used Flask, Postgresql, Redis, gunicorn and nginx for this project. This project brought, over 1 million in revenue for the company.

I deployed daily porting framework in AWS infrstructure, I used, Cloudfront, autoscaling, ELB and SAML based authentication. This deployment helped us to make a fault tolerant and highly available application.
I designed and implemented a report generation, Excel and PPT, engine using .Net, Used C# and SqlServer. I helped to move employees to more productive work by automating report generation.

work.summary: As a research associate, I implemented parallel algorithms for graph theory algorithms.
highlights: I implemented a parallel algorithm to solve maximum independent set problem in a graph, using tree decomposition

work.summary: As Sr. Software Engineer, I contributed to Apache Axis2/C project while in WSO2
highlights: I worked as a core developer and release manager for Apache Axis2/C project
I implemnted several transport layers for Axis2/C, including XMPP and TCP transports

awards.title: AWS Certified Developer - Associate
awards.summary: Tested my knowledge on different parts of AWS infrastructure including SQS, SNS, Dynamodb and S3.

awards.title: Scrum Master
awards.summary: Took a two day training followed by a test to get Scrum Master certification.

awards.title: Google Summer of Code
awards.summary: Developed high performance XML parser, Guththila, for Apache Axis2/C.
